about_the_game:
In this simulation, you start by working in a small courier shop, delivering food orders around the city. Initially, you will take on simple orders, but over time, you will have the opportunity to grow your business. By completing deliveries on time, you can save up the money you earn and invest in faster and more efficient vehicles. Additionally, you can hire new employees to expand your company and increase your workforce. As you meet the city's transportation needs and grow your earnings, you will also have the chance to obtain different licenses, allowing you to expand your delivery business into various product categories. In the later stages of the game, you can strategically expand your trade network and service range to build a larger transportation empire.





   Game Content

  • Delivery Missions: Complete deliveries on time to ensure customer satisfaction and earn income.

  • Vehicle Upgrades: Purchase new vehicles to increase your delivery capacity.

  • Employee Management: Hire new employees to grow your company.

  • Licenses: Expand your delivery business by obtaining new product licenses.

  • Strategic Growth: Use different strategies to establish the most profitable business model.

In this simulation, you start by working in a small courier shop, delivering food orders around the city. Initially, you will take on simple orders, but over time, you will have the opportunity to grow your business. By completing deliveries on time, you can save up the money you earn and invest in faster and more efficient vehicles. Additionally, you can hire new employees to expand your company and increase your workforce. As you meet the city's transportation needs and grow your earnings, you will also have the chance to obtain different licenses, allowing you to expand your delivery business into various product categories. In the later stages of the game, you can strategically expand your trade network and service range to build a larger transportation empire.

name: Transport Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 7600K / RYZEN 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Turn a small courier shop into a massive transport company. Hire new employees and purchase new vehicles. Negotiate different product licenses and build the most profitable system based on your strategy.
